attributes.title: GARBAGE
attributes.review:
Oh my god! This app is literally the worst app I have ever downloaded. After downloading, my phone started glitching. After a few minutes of straight tweaking, my phone started smoking and all of the sudden it blew up! My brand new iPhone SE 2 destroyed, all because of this app. My neighbor had the same problem after downloading! Except, he actually died; you see he was holding his phone when it exploded.
Rip Dan.

Do not download! You will die!
